tns:patch.author: dare
tns:patch.description: drop unused columns from amp_activity_version table

script.lang: alter table amp_activity_version drop contact_name,drop cont_first_name, drop cont_last_name,drop email, drop dnr_cont_title,drop dnr_cont_organization, drop dnr_cont_phone_number,drop dnr_cont_fax_number, drop mofed_cnt_first_name,drop mofed_cnt_last_name, drop mofed_cnt_email,drop mfd_cont_title, drop mfd_cont_organization,drop mfd_cont_phone_number, drop mfd_cont_fax_number,drop prj_co_first_name, drop prj_co_last_name,drop prj_co_email, drop prj_co_title,drop prj_co_organization, drop prj_co_phone_number,drop prj_co_fax_number, drop sec_min_first_name,drop sec_min_last_name, drop sec_min_email,drop sec_min_title, drop sec_min_organization,drop sec_min_phone_number, drop sec_min_fax_number;
